QuestData.Title: Best Deals Anywhere
QuestData.Description: Commander, two goblin smugglers - Mixxy and Trixxy Weldblast - came through here recently and went off towards the bog to the east.$B$BThey had drilling equipment but weren't carrying any weapons, $Gsir:madame;.$B$BI'd bet anything that they'll have materials we'd want, and that they could use some protection in return.$B$BCommander, I think seeking them out would be a good idea.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Mixxy Weldblast in Murkbog.
QuestData.RewardText: I don't know what you're doin' all the way out here, but mind helpin' a gal out since you're stopping by?
